description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. PopDog is a 2D scroller game where you try to pop all of the bubbles before time runs out. Made for the Old Spice Dream Build Play Challenge.
description.short: PopDog is a 2D scroller game where you try to pop all of the bubbles before time runs out. Made for the Old Spice Dream Build Play Challenge.
